Extraterrestrial solar irradiance (mW m-2 nm-1) as distributed with the Water Color Simulator 6 (WASI6) [1]

Source: Modtran-3 sourcecode SBDART.F
      174-351 nm = Van Hoosier et al. 1988
      351-868 nm = Neckel and Labs (1984)
      868-3226 nm = Wehrli (1985)
Modifications by Gege:      
- Conversion from cm^-1 scale to nm^-1 scale
- Spectral weighting using rectangular response functions with 1 nm widths

[1] Gege (2021): The Water Colour Simulator WASI. User manual for WASI version 6.
